sentences.sContent: Revivification of consanguinity for proper upbringing of the individuals and reformation of education on moderate and modern line are essential for instilling tolerance in the subjects.
sentences.sContent_eng: Revivification of consanguinity for proper upbringing of the individuals and reformation of education on moderate and modern line are essential for instilling tolerance in the subjects.
sentences.sCn: 恢复血亲关系是为了提供适当的个人教育和改善教育现状，这是现代社会宽容教育必不可少的课题。

words.tran: 同血亲的；同宗族的（等于consanguineous）

trans.tranCn: 血亲, 血缘, 亲密关系
trans.tranOther: when people are members of the same family
